mapper.select: select account, password, name, i_no, u_id, pid, pname, scl_id, scl_name, avatar from user, permission, school where user.school=school.scl_id and user.permission=permission.pid and account=#{account}
select account, password, name, i_no, u_id, pid, pname, scl_id, scl_name, avatar from user, permission, school where user.school=school.scl_id and user.permission=permission.pid and u_id=#{uid}

select name, i_no, u_id, permission as pid, school.scl_name from user, course_member, school where user.u_id=course_member.member and user.school=school.scl_id and course_member.cno=#{cno} and user.permission=1 and course_member.status=0

select name, i_no, u_id, permission as pid, school.scl_name from user, course_member, school where user.u_id=course_member.member and user.school=school.scl_id and user.permission=2 and course_member.cno=#{cno} and course_member.status=0
select name, i_no, u_id, permission as pid, school.scl_name from user, course, school where user.u_id=course.admin and user.school=school.scl_id and course.cno=#{cno}
mapper.insert: insert into user (account, password, permission, name, school, i_no, u_id) values (#{user.account}, #{user.password}, #{user.permission.pid}, #{user.name}, #{user.school.sclID}, #{user.identifyNo}, #{user.userId})
